results.title: beta-Adrenoreceptor antagonists in essential tremor.
results.text_hl: Three different beta-adrenoreceptor antagonists--@CHEMICAL_Propranolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011433 @@@propranolol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sotalol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013015 @@@sotalol@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@--were compared in a double-blind study with placebo in nine @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Tremor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020329 @@@essential tremor@@@.

results.title: Memory function--effects of different antihypertensive drugs.
results.text_hl: Recently, memory function has been assessed in a group of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ treated with either a beta-blocker (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@) or an angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (@CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@) in a randomised, observer-blind study in moderate @<m>DISEASE_Essential_Tremor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020329 @@@essential@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.
